feed.title: Azure Architecture Center
feed.subtitle: Updated articles for Azure Architecture Center

entry.title: ValOps for Autonomous Vehicle Operations
entry.summary: Learn how to use Azure services to build a validation operations (ValOps) solution for an automated driving system.

entry.title: Automotive messaging, data, and analytics
entry.summary: Learn how to create a scalable and reliable solution for messaging and data analytics in the automotive industry.

entry.title: Azure Load Testing with custom plugins to simulate device behaviors
entry.summary: Learn about designing KPIs and developing a dashboard for Azure Load Testing with custom JMeter plugins to simulate device behaviors.

entry.title: Modernize mainframe and midrange data
entry.summary: Learn how to modernize IBM mainframe and midrange data. Use a data-first approach to migrate the data to Azure.

entry.title: Replicate and sync mainframe data to Azure
entry.summary: Replicate data while you modernize mainframe and midrange systems. Sync on-premises data with Azure data during modernization.

entry.title: Data analytics for automotive test fleets
entry.summary: Learn about a data analytics solution that can democratize data access and provide R&D engineers with near real-time insights into test drive diagnostic data.

entry.title: Choose an Azure AI targeted language processing technology
entry.summary: Learn about targeted language of Azure AI services. Learn which service to use for a specific use case.

entry.title: Publish internal APIs to external users
entry.summary: In this scenario, an organization consolidates multiple APIs internally using Azure API Management deployed inside a Virtual Network.

entry.summary: Establish foundational knowledge and experience for building and deploying enterprise chat applications with Azure OpenAI, Azure Machine Learning, and Azure App Service.

entry.summary: Architecture on Azure that shows a regulated environment for researchers to access sensitive data while providing a higher level of control and data protection.

entry.summary: Guidance to workload teams that have existing MLOps investments and are interested in extending those investments to include generative AI in their workload.

entry.title: Automate PDF forms processing
entry.summary: Use Azure services such as AI Document Intelligence, Azure Logic Apps, and Azure Functions to implement cost-effective and flexible automated PDF processing.

entry.summary: Learn about a single deployable set of repeatable and maintainable patterns for creating machine learning CI/CD and retraining pipelines.

entry.summary: Learn how to deploy line-of-business applications with an internal App Service Environment v3, while considering networking boundaries, DevOps, management, and more.

entry.title: Azure API Management landing zone accelerator
entry.summary: An opinionated accelerator to deploy a secure enterprise-ready API management solution and CI/CD pipeline.

entry.title: Azure Governance Visualizer deployment guidance
entry.summary: Azure Governance Visualizer guidance for deploying and maintaining the Azure Governance Visualizer tool.

entry.title: Azure Spring Apps integrated with landing zones
entry.summary: Learn how to deploy a reference architecture for Spring Boot apps in Azure Spring Apps with landing zones so workloads can share resources via centralized management.

entry.title: Choose an Azure storage service
entry.summary: Use this guide to decide which Azure storage service best suits your application.

entry.title: Make all things redundant
entry.summary: Use these recommendations to avoid having single points of failure, by building redundancy into your application.

entry.title: Multitenancy and Azure OpenAI
entry.summary: Learn how to deploy the Azure OpenAI models and work with the features associated with each model when you have a multitenant system.

entry.title: DataOps for autonomous vehicle operations
entry.summary: Use Azure services to build an offline data operations and data management (DataOps) solution for an automated driving system.

entry.title: Multilayered protection for Azure virtual machines
entry.summary: Protect access to Azure VMs through a multilayer approach, using Azure and Entra ID security services. These recommendations align with security principles and best practices, such as defense in depth, least privilege, and zero trust.

entry.summary: Learn about Azure hybrid solutions, including alternatives to deploy and host hybrid services on-premises, at the edge, in Azure, and in other clouds.

entry.summary: This article describes approaches to consider for integrations in a multitenant solution.

entry.title: Architectural considerations for identity in a multitenant solution
entry.summary: This article describes the considerations for managing identities in a multitenant solution.

entry.title: Tenant lifecycle considerations in a multitenant solution
entry.summary: This article describes the different stages of a tenant lifecycle, and considerations for each stage.

entry.title: Considerations for updating a multitenant solution
entry.summary: This article describes considerations for updating your multitenant solution.

entry.title: Multitenancy and Application Insights
entry.summary: Learn about tenancy models that you can use with Application Insights and features that are useful when you use this service in multitenant systems.

entry.title: Use Azure Front Door in a multitenant solution
entry.summary: Learn about the features of Azure Front Door that are useful when you work in multitenant solutions.

entry.title: Deploy SAS Grid 9.4 on Azure NetApp Files
entry.summary: Learn about running SAS Grid 9.4 on Azure, using Azure NetApp Files for SASDATA storage, and about storage options for SASWORK.

entry.title: Application design considerations for mission-critical workloads on Azure
entry.summary: Learn how to implement a mission-critical workload that users access over a public endpoint without extra dependencies to other company resources.

entry.title: Application platform considerations for mission-critical workloads on Azure
entry.summary: Reference architecture for a workload that is accessed over a public endpoint without additional dependencies to other company resources - App Platform.

entry.title: Security considerations for mission-critical workloads on Azure
entry.summary: Reference architecture for a workload that is accessed over a public endpoint without dependencies to other company resources - Security.

entry.title: Google Cloud to Azure services comparison
entry.summary: Compare Google Cloud and Microsoft Azure services. Not every Google Cloud service or Azure service is listed, and not every matched service has exact feature parity.

entry.title: Azure Database for PostgreSQL considerations for multitenancy
entry.summary: This article describes the features of Azure Database for PostgreSQL that are useful when working with multitenanted systems, and it provides links to guidance and examples.

entry.title: Considerations when using domain names in a multitenant solution
entry.summary: This article describes the considerations you need to give to domain names when building multitenant web applications.

entry.title: Architectural considerations for a multitenant solution
entry.summary: This article introduces the key considerations when planning a multitenant architecture.

entry.title: Build and deploy custom document processing models on Azure
entry.summary: See Azure options for orchestrating, storing, building, deploying, and using custom document processing models.

entry.title: Index file content and metadata by using Azure AI Search
entry.summary: Build an Azure AI Search index by using file content from Azure Blob Storage and metadata from Azure Table Storage.

entry.title: Resiliency checklist for services
entry.summary: Resiliency is the ability to recover from failures and continue to function. Use this checklist to review the resiliency considerations for Azure services.

entry.title: CDN guidance
entry.summary: Guidance on using Content Delivery Networks (CDNs) to deliver high-bandwidth content hosted in Azure.

entry.title: Data partitioning strategies
entry.summary: View guidance on separating data partitions to be managed and accessed separately in different services, such as Azure Search, Azure storage queues, and more.

entry.title: Host name preservation
entry.summary: Learn how to preserve the original HTTP host name between a reverse proxy and its back-end web application in common Azure services.

entry.title: Monitoring and diagnostics guidance
entry.summary: Learn how to track how users use your distributed applications and services, trace resource utilization, and monitor the health and performance.

entry.title: Azure service retry guidance
entry.summary: Learn about the retry mechanism features for many Azure services. Retry mechanisms differ because services have different characteristics and requirements.

entry.title: Architectural approaches for control planes in multitenant solutions
entry.summary: Learn about approaches to designing and creating control planes for your multitenant solutions, including manual, low-code, and custom approaches.

entry.title: Considerations for multitenant control planes
entry.summary: Learn about the responsibilities of control planes in multitenant solutions and how to design a control plane that meets your needs.

entry.title: Data analytics for automotive test fleets
entry.summary: Learn about a data analytics solution that can democratize data access and provide R&D engineers with near real-time insights into test drive diagnostic data.

entry.title: Architectural approaches for compute in multitenant solutions
entry.summary: This article describes approaches to support multitenancy for the compute components of your solution.

entry.title: Azure Private Link service considerations for multitenancy
entry.summary: This article describes the features of Azure Private Link that are useful when working with multitenanted systems, and it provides links to guidance and examples.

entry.title: Architectural approaches for a multitenant solution
entry.summary: This article introduces the approaches you can consider when planning a multitenant architecture.

entry.title: Noisy Neighbor antipattern
entry.summary: Learn how the activity of one tenant can impact the performance of other tenants in a multitenant system.

entry.title: Related resources for multitenancy
entry.summary: This article provides a set of links and resources for architects and developers of multitenant solutions.

entry.title: Azure Cache for Redis considerations for multitenancy
entry.summary: This article describes the features of Azure Cache for Redis that are useful when you work with multitenant systems, and it provides links to guidance for how to use Azure Cache for Redis in a multitenant solution.

entry.title: Azure Sandbox
entry.summary: Accelerate your Azure project with a fully functional sandbox environment that includes virtual networks, virtual machines, and databases.

entry.title: Cost management for Kubernetes
entry.summary: Understand Kubernetes cluster and workload costs, see how to optimize and govern costs, and compare Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) and Amazon EKS options.

entry.title: Storage options for a Kubernetes cluster
entry.summary: Understand storage options for a Kubernetes cluster, and compare Amazon EKS and Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) storage options.

entry.title: Multiregion BCDR for Azure Virtual Desktop
entry.summary: Learn which options and scenarios are possible to design and implement an effective multi-region BCDR strategy for Azure Virtual Desktop.

entry.title: Performance and scale guidance for Event Hubs with Azure Functions
entry.summary: Learn how to plan for and deploy more efficient and scalable code that runs on Azure Functions and responds to Event Hubs events.

entry.title: Resilient design guidance for Event Hubs and Functions
entry.summary: Learn how to develop resilient and scalable code that runs on Azure Functions and responds to Event Hubs events.

entry.title: Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) baseline architecture for AKS on Azure Stack HCI
entry.summary: Learn how to design and implement a baseline architecture for Microsoft Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) running on Azure Stack HCI.

entry.title: Multiparty computing architecture design
entry.summary: Learn about Azure services that can help you build a multiparty computing solution, which can include cloud-based and on-premises resources.
